featured.text: When the slave owners realized the power of Capoeira, they began to punish those who practiced it.
Within a few years, Chinese restaurant owners in San Francisco had copied the recipe and 40 the thank-you notes with fortune notes.
This new understanding can enrich the relationship between dogs and their owners.
“A lot of young people don’t want to dress up for work,” says the owner of a software company, “so it’s hard to hire people if you have a conservative dress code.”
F.…you should learn how to do it well. G…but their owners should be responsible.

definition.example: The owner of the restaurant greeted us at the door.
